publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1590# Paul Martin: Acute Services at Stobhill Hospital—That the Parliament notes the current review of acute hospital services in the North of Glasgow and the large number of petitions received by the Springburn Herald in opposition to reducing acute services at Stobhill Hospital, and is concerned that Greater Glasgow Health Board have failed to demonstrate that the proposed changes in acute services at Stobhill Hospital will result in significant improvements in health care.

S1M-1590# Paul Martin: Acute Services at Stobhill Hospital—That the Parliament notes the current review of acute hospital services in the North of Glasgow and the large number of petitions received by the Springburn Herald in opposition to reducing acute services at Stobhill Hospital, and is concerned that Greater Glasgow Health Board have failed to demonstrate that the proposed changes in acute services at Stobhill Hospital will result in significant improvements in health care.
S1M-1590# Acute Services at Stobhill Hospital (lodged on 25 January 2001) Pauline McNeill*
S1M-1590# Acute Services at Stobhill Hospital (lodged on 25 January 2001) Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Mr Michael McMahon*, Ms Sandra White*, Mr Andrew Welsh*, Mike Watson*
S1M-1590# Acute Services at Stobhill Hospital (lodged on 25 January 2001) Tommy Sheridan*, Bill Butler*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Irene Oldfather*

S1M-1590# Paul Martin: Acute Services at Stobhill Hospital—That the Parliament notes the current review of acute hospital services in the North of Glasgow and the large number of petitions received by the Springburn Herald in opposition to reducing acute services at Stobhill Hospital, and is concerned that Greater Glasgow Health Board have failed to demonstrate that the proposed changes in acute services at Stobhill Hospital will result in significant improvements in health care. Supported by: Pauline McNeill, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Mr Michael McMahon, Ms Sandra White, Mr Andrew Welsh, Mike Watson, Tommy Sheridan, Bill Butler, Mr Jamie Stone, Irene Oldfather, Cathie Craigie
S1M-1590# Acute Services at Stobhill Hospital (lodged on 25 January 2001) Mr Duncan McNeil*
